group_1.textLeft: ...Welcome back, Shigure.

group_1.textRight: (But...thanks to my wish, she shouldn't be getting@into those sorts of things...not anymore...)

group_1.textLeft: Shigure...
You've been coming home awfully late these@days, haven't you?
I know you're in middle school now, but...
Your grandfather and I were just talking about@how long it takes for you to come home.
What exactly do you do after school?

group_1.textRight: (I do things...related to my Magical Girl duties.)
(Mainly...working hard as a Black Feather...@for our liberation...)

group_1.textLeft: Is this something you can't tell me about?

group_1.textRight: (Even if I told her...about Magical Girls...@she probably wouldn't understand...)

group_1.textLeft: Your grandfather is worried about you, too...
If you've fallen in with the wrong crowd...@If you feel unsafe...we can help you.
It's okay. You can tell me anything.

group_1.textRight: I'm not...doing anything wrong. I'm just@trying my best to help everyone...

group_1.textLeft: Wha...! Sh-Shigure?! Where are you going?!
Hagumun...
I'm sorry for calling you over here...at this hour.
I'm having...a really...bad day.

group_1.textRight: Your day must've been as bad as mine...
Today, everyone at drama club blew up at me@because I've been taking too long to make our@costumes and props...
Between all our duties for the Wings, I just don't@have enough time for those things anymore.
I can't exactly tell them that, though...

group_1.textLeft: My mom...got really mad at me, too...because@I've been coming home so late...
But...I can't tell her that I'm a Magical Girl...
Even if I told her...she wouldn't believe me...
We're...risking our lives...
We're objectively better...than everyone else...
And yet...no one understands...

group_1.textRight: People have no idea. I wish I could just tell them, like,@"Every day, I'm out fighting for you, protecting you..."
"Why are you so mad at me?"

group_1.textLeft: I can't...take it anymore...

group_1.textRight: If I were stronger...if I were wiser...@maybe I could just brush it all off...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah... Maybe.
(In the end...even though I'm a@Magical Girl, now... I'm still weak.)
(Even though I'm better than they are...@I can't prove it.)
(I'm still...worthless...)
